items.content_html: Taska is a lightweight yet powerful task management tool designed to streamline workflows and enhance productivity. With intuitive features like smart categorization, reminders, and collaboration, Taska helps individuals and teams stay organized effortlessly.
items.title: SaasGenix/Taska: Taska is a lightweight yet powerful task management tool designed to streamline workflows and enhance productivity. With intuitive features like smart categorization, reminders, and collaboration, Taska helps individuals and teams stay organized effortlessly.

items.content_html: JavaScript Email Protection (JEP) is a simple and lightweight way to keep your email safe from spam bots. Instead of leaving your email exposed in plain HTML (where bots can easily grab it), this script dynamically inserts it using JavaScript—making it way harder for scrapers to detect.
items.title: thegreedymaster1234/JavaScript-Email-Protection-JEP: JavaScript Email Protection (JEP) is a simple and lightweight way to keep your email safe from spam bots. Instead of leaving your email exposed in plain HTML (where bots can easily grab it), this script dynamically inserts it using JavaScript—making it way harder for scrapers to detect.

items.content_html: A lightweight event-driven microservices package for RabbitMQ in Node.js. Enables asynchronous communication, message publishing and consuming, and scalable event-driven architecture. Perfect for distributed systems and real-time applications.

items.content_html: A toolkit for creating, managing, and distributing browser bookmarklets. Includes ready-to-use productivity tools, a CLI for generating bookmarklets in multiple languages, and shared runtime libraries. Enhance your browser with lightweight, portable productivity tools.

items.content_html: Potara is a lightweight, easy-to-use proxy manager that allows you to combine multiple local ports under a single endpoint. It's perfect for developers working with microservices, multiple APIs, or any scenario where you need to route different services through a unified interface.
items.title: ThinhPhoenix/potara: Potara is a lightweight, easy-to-use proxy manager that allows you to combine multiple local ports under a single endpoint. It's perfect for developers working with microservices, multiple APIs, or any scenario where you need to route different services through a unified interface.
